definition: no end to learning (idiom); There's always something new to study./You live and learn.

sentences.english: There is no end to what the children want to know; they always like to demand the how and why.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們的求知慾是無止境的，他們凡事總要尋根究底。

sentences.english: Dream is endless, vigour is infinite .
sentences.chinese: 夢想無止境，活力無極限。

sentences.english: Children ask a seemingly never-ending stream of questions from an early age.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們從很小時就開始問一連串似乎永無止境的問題。

sentences.english: His enthusiasm for literature and the fine arts knew no bounds.
sentences.chinese: 他對文學和美藝術的熱情沒有止境。

sentences.english: How long, I can go to the end of the world.
sentences.chinese: 尚有多久，我纔可以走到天下的止境。

sentences.english: There was no end of parallel cases and these made precedents to guide me.
sentences.chinese: 這些平行發展沒有止境的案例成爲指導我的範例。

sentences.english: And jamie wanted to in life e's end to look at the world's most the blue of the sky.
sentences.chinese: 亞紀想在人生的止境看看世界上最湛藍的天空。

sentences.english: The rainbow should also cause us to realise that God will not continually tolerate wickedness and ungodliness upon the earth.
sentences.chinese: 虹也使我們的意識到神不會無止境地容忍地上的罪惡。

sentences.english: The world isn’t surrounded by a great unending river.
sentences.chinese: 這個世界不僅僅被一條無止境的河流包圍。

sentences.english: Therefore, our perspective future, knowledge is infinite, achievement foresight.
sentences.chinese: 於是，我們前瞻未來，學無止境，成就遠見。

sentences.english: My teach used to say that there is end to ignorance , but, no end to learning.
sentences.chinese: 我的老師常說，無知總有一個度，但學習是無止境的。

sentences.english: Endless hours of anticipating what will happen next?
sentences.chinese: 無止境的期待，想知道會發生什麼？

sentences.english: We feel the long pulsation, ebb and flow of endless motion.
sentences.chinese: 我們感到長久的悸動，和永無止境的潮起潮落。

sentences.english: Labor competition does not stop, A Good indefinitely.
sentences.chinese: 勞動競賽不停步，創先爭優無止境。

sentences.english: Instead, be open-minded and realize that there will always be more for you to learn.
sentences.chinese: 相反，你應該保持開放心態並認識到學無止境。

sentences.english: Fredom is only good as a means; it is no end in itself.
sentences.chinese: 自由只是一種方式，追求自由本身的過程是無止境的。

definition: to use up/to exhaust/to probe to the bottom/limit/end
